snippet.title: Village Valley Official Trailer
snippet.description: Hey everyone! Since the game is releasing today, I wanted to get a proper trailer for the game presenting some of its features. This will probably be the last trailer (unless I make another one for an update). So have fun with the game if you get it and have a nice day!
